== Distribution ==
== Distribution ==
â
TuxMath is included in numerous Linux [[Linux distribution|distributions]], including the [[Edubuntu]] flavor of [[Ubuntu (Linux distribution)|Ubuntu Linux]]. It is included as a game on the [[ASUS Eee PC]]. <ref>[http://www.linux.com/feature/124240 Linux.com review of the ASUS Eee PC], [[January]] 11, [[2008]]</ref> It was also included on the [[Dish Network]] 721 [[Digital Video Recorder||PVR]]. <ref>[http://www.newbreedsoftware.com/bill/news/2002.12.shtml News from Bill Kendrick's personal website], [[December]], [[2002]].</ref>
+
TuxMath is included in numerous Linux [[Linux distribution|distributions]], including the [[Edubuntu]] flavor of [[Ubuntu (operating system)|Ubuntu]]. It is included as a game on the [[ASUS Eee PC]]. <ref>[http://www.linux.com/feature/124240 Linux.com review of the ASUS Eee PC], [[January]] 11, [[2008]]</ref> It was also included on the [[Dish Network]] 721 [[Digital Video Recorder||PVR]]. <ref>[http://www.newbreedsoftware.com/bill/news/2002.12.shtml News from Bill Kendrick's personal website], [[December]], [[2002]].</ref>
